title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: The Cluckin’ Bell Farm Raid Chaos Continues
content:
Stick it to the LSPD by putting an end to their corrupt partnership with a burgeoning cartel in The Cluckin’ Bell Farm Raid, the latest free action-packed update to GTA Online.

This week, complete any of the Setup Missions and all non-leaders will earn 2X GTA$ through March 20. Everyone will also get 2X RP from all Setup Missions, and the available Mission Bonuses in both Hit and Run and Disorganized Crime are awarding 2X GTA$ to all players.
